Class CameraField

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CameraField
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    UI element to select a camera device.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isChoice

        public boolean isChoice()
        Returns true if there are at least two cameras, i.e. the user has a real choice which camera to pick.
        Returns:
        True if the user has the choice between at least two cameras.
